info.name: doxygen - black
info.description: Black doxygen website with extra space, good for extra reading space and dark so its easier on the eyes. I whipped this together in a half hour so it's a little rigid but should do the trick.
info.additionalInfo:
1) I removed the chat buttons, if you want them back just delete the line "display: none" in the code.
2) This is for dimitri's doxygen page, I am not sure if you can apply it to all doxygen pages (but you might), try it by changing the "document url-prefix" in the code to the url of your/their site that contains doxygen generated documentation. I havent had a chance to check this against my own doxygen gens yet but will soon.
